text: Introduction .Part - of - speech tagging consists of labeling each word in a sentence by its appropriate part of speech , e.g. verb , noun , adjective , adverb .Since many words can act as multiple parts of speech , tagging requires disambiguating the use of the word in the context of a particular sentence .
